html:
5.8.25  1:35 pm   before microphones, how would governors and popes address huge crowds, was a big voice required qualification?

     yes

     where there people every x distance repeating the words?

     i'm not sure. audiences were surely smaller

5.8.25  1:04 pm   i can't tell if something is not real if it doesn't exist but someone says otherwise
so it must be real correct

      'real' and 'exist' are both words that you're gonna get the hang of anyway as you go through life. staring really hard directly at a word is probably not gonna help you understand it. the words are actually just to help you understand other things

5.8.25  12:48 pm   there's a new pope, bill. is it you?

      no

5.8.25  12:34 pm   how far is a lightyear?

      i'm not sure. but it's how far light travels in a year

5.8.25  12:26 pm   What would your three wishes be if you met a genie?

      not to have met a genie

5.8.25  12:17 pm   Why do baguette looks like a tube ?

      the tube is based on the baguette

5.8.25  10:51 am   what is the importance or point of music?

      the point is to provide point-finding opportunities for all the point-finders out there

5.8.25  10:11 am   Have you felt

      yes in fact i am still doing that

5.8.25  10:04 am   i please ask to have revealed to this board the most recent awesome thing you remember chronologically from the moment of reading the word at the end of this sentence NOW!

      i'm gonna do all my songs

5.8.25  9:21 am   How do I grow a tree?

      can't grow a tree. can only plant a tree

5.8.25  9:03 am   do you believe in god

      i believe in you

5.8.25  7:25 am   are you a crocodile

      no

5.8.25  7:16 am   do you watch wrestling?

      no, but i trust that it's there

5.8.25  5:29 am   sometimes i sit there and go "romance seems quite cool, i wish it was real" and then i remember that for most people it is (not me though cause im aromantic), which seems very strange to me. how reasonable is it that something which is very normal for like 99% of the population just seems *weird* to me?

      i don't know if i'm following some of your assessments. you're saying you think 99% of the population is 'romantic' and you are 'not'. What i would say is, we see a lot of 'romance' in the movies which all has a certain cliche quality to it, but in real life people probably have a wide range of experiences that are much different

5.8.25  4:36 am   Do you spell ax like that? If not what do you think of doing so?

      i think that's perfectly reasonable. the alternate spelling would be axe, and i'm honestly not opposed to dropping silent letters. in the long run it's gonna happen anyway, sort of a natural clean up process

5.8.25  4:24 am   favorite Family Feud moment?

      that moment just after the contestant says their answer, the host repeats that noddingly back to them, as if to suggest 'yeah, i think thats a pretty good answer!' before checking the board

5.8.25  4:18 am   do you ever wonder if snails know where they are?

      no, i am confident they know where they are. at least in any reasonable sense of that phrase

5.8.25  3:43 am   is it weird i like burnt toast

      it's not the weirdest thing

5.8.25  2:56 am   any tips for beating my dad at pool/billiards?

      just get really good at the game by playing it a lot

5.8.25  2:18 am   what percentage of the fun of making a video is you getting to dance around w stuff in your house?

     that is one of the highlights. that is essentially the stage for me

      Also does triangle quality matter? Cause urs sounds way better than it looks. I thought only the cool chrome ones sounded that good

      in spelling, which letter looks best? that's not what counts. what counts is what words you spell

5.8.25  1:53 am   Why do I always fail to answer a teacher's question correctly even if I'm great at the subject that the teacher asked me about

      basically there was just a failure for you and the other person to communicate, and neither party should be blamed

5.8.25  1:23 am   How can i see the back of my head without mirror?

      how about a photo or video recording

5.8.25  12:49 am   how to tell if in love

      you can pretty much just decide. although if the other person doesnt agree then that's gonna be awkward i suspect

5.8.25  12:42 am   I asked a question before but I forgot to see if you responded. Can you find it for me please?

      sure, it was probably this one

5.8.25  12:28 am   can you please explain paradoxes in simple terms.

      any kind of impossible concept. a bird that has wings and also doesnt have wings. it's some kind of impossible logic that breaks the game

5.8.25  12:18 am   what is life?

      movement

5.8.25  12:06 am   if there were two witches and two watches, which witch would watch which watch?

      each witch would watch one watch. then they should switch

5.7.25  10:45 pm   Why can I only sleep well when I have jeans on?

      it's hard to fall asleep when you're under pressure to fall asleep. when you have jeans on, there's the feeling that you're not even supposed to fall asleep

5.7.25  10:41 pm   What is a hamburger 

      i'm not entirely sure

5.7.25  10:29 pm   how small do you have to be to be too small for the mall?

      less than 1 planck

5.7.25  10:21 pm   sometimes i like to download custom charts for songs on guitar hero as a way to listen to music as it's more engaging for my brain does this seem reasonable

      absolutely

5.7.25  8:30 pm   i have consumed a carrot

      that's very impressive

5.7.25  8:13 pm   what software do you use to shnlorp your videos and glorpsz the music? is ashlorpsleton better that fl shtusdorp

      i am kinda messed up in the head so i have a much different relationship with software than anyone else i know. my answer here would be only misleading

5.7.25  8:11 pm   where are the words ending in J?

      dutch, swedish, ... except it probably sounds like y

5.7.25  7:58 pm   what is your favorite font?

      whatever the default is

5.7.25  7:05 pm   why is sunlight flowing through windows so pretty?

      the shadows help you see what the light is doing

5.7.25  4:54 pm   How do I trick myself into doing the morning chores? They fill me with anguish 

      start a contest for how many days in a row you can do them

5.7.25  4:26 pm   Does cilantro taste like soap to you?

      not really, but i've never eaten pure cilantro

5.7.25  3:53 pm   did you know about carbon copy paper? i didnt and someone used it on me and it blew my mind

      yes this is from the old days

5.7.25  2:48 pm   how do I get myself to eat when my appetite is terrible but my stomach is clearly empty

      how about bread

5.7.25  2:32 pm   how fast are things?

      slow

5.7.25  2:21 pm   do you make your own music

      yes

5.7.25  2:10 pm   Have you ever decided to forever quit working on a specific song after having written the lyrics?

      no

5.7.25  1:08 pm   can i trust you

      i think so, but can i trust myself

5.7.25  12:26 pm   if you could describe yourself in one word what would it be

      person

5.7.25  12:15 pm   Why is water so moist?

      wasn't me

5.7.25  9:54 am   currently doing exams rn. any tips with dealing with stress?

      cold water on the face? might work

5.7.25  7:09 am   any thoughts on psychic phenomena? clairvoyance, sharing dreams etc etc 

      there's no reason it shouldn't or couldn't exist, but i've never experienced it

5.7.25  4:46 am   is australia real?

      yes but i can't prove it

5.7.25  3:27 am   What does it mean to have a flat mix? Does it mean lack of dynamics?

      who knows. at the very least, it probably means the person doesnt like it
